document.full_text: a natural gas line exploded in minneapolis on thursday, shooting flames several stories into the air, forcing the evacuation of businesses and homes and bringing traffic to a standstill on major highways.
document.title: gas explosion, fire in minneapolis force evacuations
lines_and_colors: a natural gas line exploded in minneapolis on thursday, shooting flames several stories into the air, forcing the evacuation of businesses and homes and bringing traffic to a standstill on major highways.
